Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI will generate more clear solution with steps, while teacher will also give the solution with key processes and lead a general way for students to self-improve. And some explain from teacher will more easily to understand.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The GenAI feedback is clear but general at all the content I input in, on the opposite, the feedback from teacher will be more specific focus on detail, which is better for me to refine.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Most of the time the feedback from GenAI is quite similar and general, while the feedback from teacher could design for different objects.
